00017 static inline float Sqr( float x )      {       return x*x;             }

00027 //----------------------------------------------------------
00028 MAABox::MAABox( const MVec3& center, const MVec3& halfExts )
00029 : _center( center )
00030 , _halfExts( halfExts.Abs() )
00031 {
00032 
00033 }
00034 
00035 //----------------------------------------------------------
00036 MAABox::MAABox( const MOBox& box )
00037 {
00039         MVec3 corners[ 8 ];
00040         box.GetCorners( corners );
00041 
00043         MVec3 minExts( FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX );
00044         MVec3 maxExts( -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX );
00045         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; ++i )
00046         {
00048                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00049                         minExts[ j ] = Min( minExts[ j ], corners[ i ][ j ] );
00050 
00052                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00053                         maxExts[ j ] = Max( maxExts[ j ], corners[ i ][ j ] );
00054         }
00055 
00057         _center = 0.5f * ( maxExts + minExts );
00058         _halfExts = 0.5f * ( maxExts - minExts );
00059 }
00060

00062 MAABox::~MAABox()
00063 {
00064 
00065 }

00072 //----------------------------------------------------------
00073 float
00074 MAABox::Dist( const MVec3& pos )
00075 {
00076         float boxMin[ 3 ] =
00077         {
00078                 _center.GetX() - _halfExts.GetX(),
00079                 _center.GetY() - _halfExts.GetY(),
00080                 _center.GetZ() - _halfExts.GetZ(),
00081         };
00082         float boxMax[ 3 ] =
00083         {
00084                 _center.GetX() + _halfExts.GetX(),
00085                 _center.GetY() + _halfExts.GetY(),
00086                 _center.GetZ() + _halfExts.GetZ(),
00087         };
00088 
00090         float axisDist[ 3 ] = { 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f };
00091         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00092         {
00093                 float axisMax = _center[ i ] + _halfExts[ i ];
00094                 if ( pos[ i ] > boxMax[ i ] )
00095                 {
00096                         axisDist[ i ] = pos[ i ] - boxMax[ i ];
00097                 }
00098                 else
00099                 {
00100                         float axisMin = _center[ i ] + _halfExts[ i ];
00101                         if ( pos[ i ] < boxMin[ i ] )
00102                                 axisDist[ i ] = boxMin[ i ] - pos[ i ];
00103                 }
00104         }
00105 
00107         float magSqr = axisDist[ 0 ] * axisDist[ 0 ] +
00108                                    axisDist[ 1 ] * axisDist[ 1 ] +
00109                                    axisDist[ 2 ] * axisDist[ 2 ];
00110         return Sqrt( magSqr );
00111 }

00113 //----------------------------------------------------------
00114 bool
00115 MAABox::Intersect( const MAABox& box ) const
00116 {
00118         MVec3 dist( ( _center - box._center ).Abs() );
00119 
00121         if ( dist.GetX() > ( _halfExts.GetX() + box._halfExts.GetX() ) )
00122                 return false;
00123         if ( dist.GetY() > ( _halfExts.GetY() + box._halfExts.GetY() ) )
00124                 return false;
00125         if ( dist.GetZ() > ( _halfExts.GetZ() + box._halfExts.GetZ() ) )
00126                 return false;
00127 
00129         return true;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //----------------------------------------------------------
00133 bool
00134 MAABox::Intersect( const MSphere& sphere ) const
00135 {
00136         float dist = 0.0f;
00137 
00138         MVec3 boxMin = _center - _halfExts;
00139         MVec3 boxMax = _center + _halfExts;
00140 
00142     if ( sphere.GetCenter().GetX() < boxMin.GetX() )
00143                 dist += Sqr( sphere.GetCenter().GetX() - boxMin.GetX() );
00144     else if ( sphere.GetCenter().GetX() > boxMax.GetX() ) 
00145                 dist += Sqr( sphere.GetCenter().GetX() - boxMax.GetX() );
00146 
00148     if ( sphere.GetCenter().GetY() < boxMin.GetY() ) 
00149                 dist += Sqr( sphere.GetCenter().GetY() - boxMin.GetY() ); 
00150     else if ( sphere.GetCenter().GetY() > boxMax.GetY() ) 
00151                 dist += Sqr( sphere.GetCenter().GetY() - boxMax.GetY() );
00152 
00154     if ( sphere.GetCenter().GetZ() < boxMin.GetZ() ) 
00155                 dist += Sqr( sphere.GetCenter().GetZ() - boxMin.GetZ() ); 
00156     else if ( sphere.GetCenter().GetZ() > boxMax.GetZ() ) 
00157                 dist += Sqr( sphere.GetCenter().GetZ() - boxMax.GetZ() );
00158 
00160     return dist <= Sqr( sphere.GetRadius() );
00161 }
00162 
00163 //----------------------------------------------------------
00164 MSphere
00165 MAABox::GetBoundingSphere()
00166 {
00167         return MSphere( _center, _halfExts.Mag() );
00168 }

00170 //----------------------------------------------------------
00171 bool
00172 MAABox::AddBoxToVolume( const MAABox& box )
00173 {
00175         MVec3 boxMin = box._center - box._halfExts;
00176         MVec3 boxMax = box._center + box._halfExts;
00177         MVec3 thisMin = _center - _halfExts;
00178         MVec3 thisMax = _center + _halfExts;
00179 
00181         if ( boxMin.GetX() >= thisMin.GetX() &&
00182                  boxMin.GetY() >= thisMin.GetY() &&
00183                  boxMin.GetZ() >= thisMin.GetZ() &&
00184                  boxMax.GetX() <= thisMin.GetX() &&
00185                  boxMax.GetY() <= thisMin.GetY() &&
00186                  boxMax.GetZ() <= thisMin.GetZ() )
00187                 return false;
00188 
00190         MVec3 newMin( Min( boxMin.GetX(), thisMin.GetX() ),
00191                                   Min( boxMin.GetY(), thisMin.GetY() ),
00192                                   Min( boxMin.GetZ(), thisMin.GetZ() ) );
00193         MVec3 newMax( Max( boxMax.GetX(), thisMax.GetX() ),
00194                                   Max( boxMax.GetY(), thisMax.GetY() ),
00195                                   Max( boxMax.GetZ(), thisMax.GetZ() ) );
00196 
00198         _center = 0.5f * ( newMax + newMin );
00199         _halfExts = 0.5f * ( newMax - newMin );
00200 
00202         return true;
00203 }
00204 
00205 //----------------------------------------------------------
00206 bool
00207 MAABox::AddBoxToVolume( const MOBox& box )
00208 {
00210         MVec3 pts[ 8 ];
00211         box.GetCorners( pts );
00212 
00213         MVec3 thisMin = _center - _halfExts;
00214         MVec3 thisMax = _center + _halfExts;
00215 
00217         MVec3 boxMin = box.GetTransform().GetTranslate();
00218         MVec3 boxMax = boxMin;
00219         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; ++i )
00220         {
00221                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00222                 {
00223                         boxMin[ j ] = Min( pts[ i ][ j ], boxMin[ j ] );
00224                         boxMax[ j ] = Max( pts[ i ][ j ], boxMax[ j ] );
00225                 }
00226         }
00227 
00229         if ( boxMin.GetX() >= thisMin.GetX() &&
00230                  boxMin.GetY() >= thisMin.GetY() &&
00231                  boxMin.GetZ() >= thisMin.GetZ() &&
00232                  boxMax.GetX() <= thisMin.GetX() &&
00233                  boxMax.GetY() <= thisMin.GetY() &&
00234                  boxMax.GetZ() <= thisMin.GetZ() )
00235                 return false;
00236 
00238         MVec3 newMin( Min( boxMin.GetX(), thisMin.GetX() ),
00239                                   Min( boxMin.GetY(), thisMin.GetY() ),
00240                                   Min( boxMin.GetZ(), thisMin.GetZ() ) );
00241         MVec3 newMax( Max( boxMax.GetX(), thisMax.GetX() ),
00242                                   Max( boxMax.GetY(), thisMax.GetY() ),
00243                                   Max( boxMax.GetZ(), thisMax.GetZ() ) );
00244 
00246         _center = 0.5f * ( newMax + newMin );
00247         _halfExts = 0.5f * ( newMax - newMin );
00248 
00250         return true;
00251 }

00254 void
00255 MAABox::GetCorners( MVec3 *pts ) const
00256 {
00258         pts[ 0 ].SetX( _center.GetX() - _halfExts.GetX() );
00259         pts[ 0 ].SetY( _center.GetY() - _halfExts.GetY() );
00260         pts[ 0 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() - _halfExts.GetZ() );
00261 
00263         pts[ 1 ].SetX( _center.GetX() - _halfExts.GetX() );
00264         pts[ 1 ].SetY( _center.GetY() - _halfExts.GetY() );
00265         pts[ 1 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() + _halfExts.GetZ() );
00266 
00268         pts[ 2 ].SetX( _center.GetX() + _halfExts.GetX() );
00269         pts[ 2 ].SetY( _center.GetY() - _halfExts.GetY() );
00270         pts[ 2 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() + _halfExts.GetZ() );
00271 
00273         pts[ 3 ].SetX( _center.GetX() + _halfExts.GetX() );
00274         pts[ 3 ].SetY( _center.GetY() - _halfExts.GetY() );
00275         pts[ 3 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() - _halfExts.GetZ() );
00276 
00278         pts[ 4 ].SetX( _center.GetX() - _halfExts.GetX() );
00279         pts[ 4 ].SetY( _center.GetY() + _halfExts.GetY() );
00280         pts[ 4 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() - _halfExts.GetZ() );
00281 
00283         pts[ 5 ].SetX( _center.GetX() - _halfExts.GetX() );
00284         pts[ 5 ].SetY( _center.GetY() + _halfExts.GetY() );
00285         pts[ 5 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() + _halfExts.GetZ() );
00286 
00288         pts[ 6 ].SetX( _center.GetX() + _halfExts.GetX() );
00289         pts[ 6 ].SetY( _center.GetY() + _halfExts.GetY() );
00290         pts[ 6 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() + _halfExts.GetZ() );
00291 
00293         pts[ 7 ].SetX( _center.GetX() + _halfExts.GetX() );
00294         pts[ 7 ].SetY( _center.GetY() + _halfExts.GetY() );
00295         pts[ 7 ].SetZ( _center.GetZ() - _halfExts.GetZ() );

00299         pts[ 1 ] = SVec3( pos.x - halfWidth, pos.y - halfHeight, pos.z + halfDepth );           //! bottom, forward-left.
00300         pts[ 2 ] = SVec3( pos.x + halfWidth, pos.y - halfHeight, pos.z + halfDepth );           //! bottom, forward-right.
00301         pts[ 3 ] = SVec3( pos.x + halfWidth, pos.y - halfHeight, pos.z - halfDepth );           //! bottom, back-right.
00302         pts[ 4 ] = SVec3( pos.x - halfWidth, pos.y + halfHeight, pos.z - halfDepth );           //! top, back-left.
00303         pts[ 5 ] = SVec3( pos.x - halfWidth, pos.y + halfHeight, pos.z + halfDepth );           //! top, forward-left.
00304         pts[ 6 ] = SVec3( pos.x + halfWidth, pos.y + halfHeight, pos.z + halfDepth );           //! top, forward-right.

00328 //----------------------------------------------------------
00329 bool
00330 MAABox::IsInside( const MVec3& pt ) const
00331 {
00332         MVec3 relativePos = ( pt - _center );
00333         return (
00334                 Abs( relativePos.GetX() ) < _halfExts.GetX() &&
00335                 Abs( relativePos.GetY() ) < _halfExts.GetY() &&
00336                 Abs( relativePos.GetZ() ) < _halfExts.GetZ()
00337                 );
00338 }
00339 
00340 //----------------------------------------------------------
00341 int
00342 MAABox::GetSide( const MPlane& plane ) const
00343 {
00344         float hX = _halfExts.GetX();
00345         float hY = _halfExts.GetY();
00346         float hZ = _halfExts.GetZ();
00347 
00349         int side = plane.GetSide( _center + _halfExts, 0.0f );
00350         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( -hX, hY, hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00351                 return 0;
00352         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( hX, -hY, hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00353                 return 0;
00354         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( -hX, -hY, hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00355                 return 0;
00356         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( hX, hY, -hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00357                 return 0;
00358         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( -hX, hY, -hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00359                 return 0;
00360         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( hX, -hY, -hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00361                 return 0;
00362         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _center + MVec3( -hX, -hY, -hZ ), 0.0f ) )
00363                 return 0;
00364 
00366         return side;
00367 }
